entry.title: Picture You
entry.summary:
Author: harpsichordsandthelit

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,193Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 393

Summary: Clark Kent just moved into a new apartment. The building is nice. His neighbors are welcoming. He heard some good things about the guy who lived here before him.And then he received a postcard.  Hey, I used to live in your apartment. I’m drunk in Gotham, and it’s the only address I can think of. Happy Holidays. B. W.  Inspired by this Tumblr post

entry.title: Tentacles of Love
entry.summary:
Author: LadyArkin

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,233Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 60

Summary: He wasn’t even offering much more than, “I need a favor, buddy.”Batman’s marriage proposal was sudden and…strategic.Once they’ve spent some time together, Batman talks Superman into marrying for a mission. A mission that Bruce declares to be entirely selfish which he needs for business purposes. This mission isn’t supposed to be impactful to either of their personal lives.It starts when Bruce releases pictures of Batman proposing to Superman. He didn’t need more than a distraction and if it hadn’t been for an intervention from their family and friends, it wouldn’t have been. The more involved their blended family gets into their relationship, the more that they are supported in their relationship.

entry.title: Hiding In Plain Sight
entry.summary:
Author: aster_ion

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,967Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 9

Summary: Batman is wary of Superman. He doesn't trust the all powerful alien – he's seen firsthand how absolute power can corrupt an individual. It’s only a matter of time before he snaps.Clark Kent is wary of Bruce Wayne. He's met too many men like him – charming, arrogant, and swimming in more money than they know what to do with. He’s hiding something, Clark is sure of it.Bruce would do anything to learn more about the threat Superman poses, so when an unassuming new reporter with mysterious connections to the superhero takes over the Gotham beat, he doesn’t pass up the opportunity.Seducing Clark Kent wasn’t exactly the plan, but hey, Bruce isn’t complaining.

entry.title: We Could Be Heroes - A SuperBat Love Story
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,356Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 57

Summary: Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent both maintain a strong sense of justice and fight for peace in their respective cities. However, both are struggling to maintain order alone, and are weighed down by a lost sense of identity and the loneliness that stems from the isolation of living a double life. After a chance encounter, the pair agree to form a Justice League to address the growing threat to Earth's security. As they learn to work together, new feelings blossom, and the heroes soon find themselves leaning on each other for support and comfort.Slow-burn romance. Bat-family drama. Justice League shenanigans. Bruce being a rich kid with issues. Superman being an innocent lad.Heavily inspired by Batman/Superman The Animated Series, Justice League, & Justice League Unlimited. Also takes inspiration from The Batman (2022), My Adventures With Superman (2023), and Batman: Caped Crusader (2024), and Smallville (2001).

entry.title: It's Not One
entry.summary:
Author: kingsarah

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,104Chapters: 1/9Kudos: 6

Summary: One name written over a heart tying two people together. One pair of soulmates trying to figure out what that means.Clark and Bruce have finally come together and accepted each other as soulmates, but it’s not happily ever after yet. One thing after another causes turbulence in their budding relationship. Just because they are soulmates doesn’t mean the path is smooth. But maybe it’s not one thing that defines a relationship, but innumerable little actions over time.Sequel to Redamancy.

entry.title: strike up the band and make the fireflies dance
entry.summary:
Author: ok_this_is_love

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,274Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 51

Summary: Clark opens his eyes. His gaze meets Bruce’s--blue and burning, like some small ember has sparked in the space between them.Bruce swallows.And then Clark trips.It happens so suddenly that Bruce barely has time to react. Clark stumbles over his own feet, arms flailing for balance, and Bruce moves instinctively--his grip tightening, pulling Clark against him before they can both go crashing to the floor.

entry.title: And They Were Just Best Friends
entry.summary:
Author: kitfornow

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,270Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 640

Summary: “Uh—before we begin,” Clark announces, “a bit of personal business. I am officially engaged!”“What!?” Barry asks excitedly.“Wow!” Diana exclaims. “Most congratulations!” Hal and Oliver clap and whoop, and Clark smiles in appreciation.“Ohmygosh,” Barry continues, “I was just saying the other day that you two would figure it out! Hal, you owe me twenty—”“—To Lois Lane," Bruce interrupts, still staring out the window.Bruce’s interruption has the entire table falling silent, faces genuinely falling, mouths snapping closed. Clark doesn’t really understand why anyone would need the clarification.-A 5+1(+1) Things crack fic that I couldn't stop thinking about.

entry.title: By the Book (Which One?)
entry.summary:
Author: LoveintheWind

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,021Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 119

Summary: “Oh, sure! So, technically, we need to deny any wrongdoing, accept full responsibility, blame it on an external force, negotiate peace with aliens, assassinate their Queen, propose a diplomatic alliance, and—get this—start a space war with Tamaran. Totally doable.”There was a beat of silence.“…Wait, I got it!” Spoiler cut in. “What if we combined Plan 26, Phase 4 with Plan 98, Phase 2?”Signal squinted. “Wouldn’t work. Queen Industries stock is too high. A coup in Khandaq?”Nightwing shot back, “ Black Adam’s speeches are terrible.”Red Hood scrolled. “How about a sex scandal? International—”“No,” Nightwing interrupted. “Last time, Zatanna’s rabbits were a nightmare.”Red Hood sighed. “So, our best options are: fake Wonder Woman’s death, Hal and Aquaman’s wedding, a Lobo-Queen of England sex scandal, resurrect Harvey Dent’s father to turn him good again, or... I take over the family business.” He turned to the group. “Any takers?”The League just stared.“…You people are insane,” Flash muttered.

entry.summary:
Author: Flamou

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,074Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 77

Summary: What it says in the title: the concept of "would you still love me if I were a worm" taken literally.Superman is transformed into a worm during a mission. Bruce adapts, as always, and dutifully takes care of him. Safety? Check. The best terrarium in Gotham? Also check. Entertainment and comfort? Triple check. entry.title: Expectations.
entry.summary:
Author: Karaxuno

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,249Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 99

Summary: “I noticed Robin was new.” Clark says, settling next to him in the monitor room.Bruce hums.“What happened to the first one? He was a good kid.”Rain on gravestones. Doors slamming. Handstands. Laughter in the Batmobile. Screaming. Crying. Leave me al-Bruce clears his throat, pushing those memories down, down, down, “You never met the first Robin.” He snaps, abruptly pushing up from his chair. -The soulmate AU where Dick and Bruce have each other’s words, and that’s how the Batfamily come together.
